title: Constable

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to create a Warrant for. Warrants only last for two nights.
- During the day, you may shoot a player. 0 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player with a Warrant is hanged and they were evil, you gain 1 use of your gun.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may shoot a player, dealing a basic attack and cleaning them. If you kill a player from a good-aligned faction, you immediately die. 1 use.

desc:
Post 4688
*It's alright, I'll only get a slap on the wrist for it.*
